title: Внутренняя Мимперия
overview: The series tells about the complexities adult life and solving difficulties through metaphors and humor.Crazy chat of neighbors in the house. Unemployed loser Pandych becomes the main entrance and falls into the most ordinary chat. neighbors: a family of trees, a vampire in law, a dedosaurus, a mime thief, etc.Household apocalypse, screenlife scandals and the search for meaning life on the scale of a dead entrance. Solving problems with the broken elevator, 24-hour shops"Black and white" and noisy Pandych finds new ones at parties friends and slowly starts understand their own life.
